item.title: Search Man Pages With Apropos
item.description: Unix man pages are a mixed bag, but they’re faster than Google if you know where to look. That’s where the apropos program comes in. E.G. to search for man pages for errno: $ apropos errno clnt_perrno (3) - library routines for remote procedure calls clnt_sperrno (3) - library routines for remote procedure calls errno (3) - number of last error h_errno (3) - get network host entry This returns the man page name and section number (run man man for a list of section numbers and their meaning).
